item.description:
On Oct. 26th John Slonina is presenting "Bears of North America" - Meeting starts at 7:30 pm . Doors open at 7 pm.


Location is at "St. Andrews Church" in Framingham.
Address
Three Maple Street
Framingham, MA 01702


Announcement (below) and other information is posted on http://www.gatewaycam...


Sponsor: Hunt's Photo and Video

Bear Country: North America
Presented by John Slonina
Tuesday October 26 7:30 PM

Join Professional nature photographer John Slonina as he travels across North America to photograph his favorite subjects Bears. Explore grizzly bears in Alaska, Polar Bears in Canada, and Black Bears in Minnesota and New England. He has many adventures and photos to share. He also will discuss photo technique for bear photography.

John Slonina is a professional nature photographer. A passion for wildlife and wild places and teaching has led him down the path to photography. He has been photographing nature for over 25 years. He also has a photo tour company which leads photo workshop across North America. His work has been published in calendars, books, and magazines and shown in galleries.

Website: www.sphotography.com
Blog: http://wildphotograph...

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: John Slonina is presenting "Bears of North America"
